In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L P : context -> Prop Hderiv : derivable_superset_preserved P Phi, Psi : Ensemble expr HIncl : Included expr Phi Psi HP : P Phi deduction_weaken : forall (Phi Psi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Included expr Phi Psi -> Phi |-- x -> Psi |-- x derivable_assum : forall (Phi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Ensembles.In expr Phi x -> Phi |-- x deduction_subst : forall (Phi Psi : context) (y : expr), (forall x : expr, Psi x -> Phi |-- x) -> Union expr Phi Psi |-- y -> Phi |-- y Unable to unify "Included expr Phi Psi" with "P Psi".

original: intros P Hderiv. unfold superset_preserved. intros Phi Psi HIncl HP. apply Hderiv. apply HIncl. apply HP.
